I choose this ipad as replacement of laptop to ease my work during travelling. Might be not as good as ipad pro but ot serve the purpose.

This is my second purchase from switch online, before I bought macbook, but this is the 1st time I bought from their shopee acc. Packaging wise is okay, only single layer of bubble wrap, but the packaging is fit enough, so the ipad wont shake around during transit. 

Ipad works just fine, bee thinking whether to buy android tab or ipad, hence I went for ipad bcuz my gadgets are apple stuffs. Hence my advice if u use apple stuffs go for ipad.
